'''Build 0033''' (or '''Build 1.66.0033.0''') is a development version of {{edition|xbox 360}}. This version is based off [[Java Edition Beta 1.6.6]].

The only archived copy of this build (labelled "Minecraft Reloaded") was tampered with, containing an edited <samp>[[terrain.png]]</samp> using textures from the [https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/moderncraft-official/ ModernCraft] texture pack.<ref>https://youtu.be/xBx-O7RYtOY?t=512</ref>. Despite what is often claimed, these textures were added to the game by a third party, and were not used officially by 4J Studios. The mipmapped versions of <samp>[[terrain.png]]</samp> were not edited, so distant blocks still use the vanilla textures. The modified Xbox dashboard description states "Minecraft with custom textures and stuff. v0.1a".

== Additions  ==
* Added tooltips to the in-game interface.{{More info needed|What exactly?}}
* Added split-screen play.{{More info needed|Differences with TU0?}}
* Added "Download Content" button to the title screen.{{More info needed|What exactly?}}
* A new tutorial world has been added, introducing players to game. This version is similar to the original world, albeit with differences. {{More info needed|What exactly?}}

== Changes  ==
* Changed the font.
* Changed the World Select menus.{{more info needed|What exactly?}}
* Changed crafting interface.
* Improved rendering and lighting.{{more info needed|Visually looks better than 0016, but needs evidence.}}

== Removals ==
* Removed the greyed-out "Multiplayer" button from the title screen.
* Removed the small MineCon logo from the top left corner.
** This graphic still remains in the game in TU0.

== Trivia ==
* This build comes from Xbox PartnerNet - an internal Xbox LIVE service used by developers to test games before release.{{More info needed|What exactly?}}
** Partnernet has been the source of many XBLA leaks, especially around this time.
